name: Mountainwatch
tag_list: mountainwatch, snow-cams, snow-report, snow-forecast, perisher, thredbo, hotham, buller, treble-cone, coronet-peak, ski-nz, australian-snow-reports
description: Snow Report, Snow Forecast and Snow Cams
overview: The Mountainwatch.com team is as passionate and dedicated about the mountains as you are. Skiing to snowboarding, hiking to biking, everything about those huge piles of dirt and rock keep our blood flowing. There team strives to provide you with detailed weather, conditions and vision of our most used mountain areas in Australia, New Zealand and the world. All for Free.
